segments.text: May , is this the Hall of Ancient China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Look at these historical relics here , amazing !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are they all in glass boxes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For protection . Some relics will turn to dust if exposed to air .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So there isn't air in the glass boxes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , there isn't . They are all vacuumed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wonder how old these things are , thousands of years ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , they all come from a very ancient time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , look at the three-leg cup . I've seen it on TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The bronze cup was made 4,000 years ago . It's priceless !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , it has no value at all . Who will use this cup today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Danny , priceless means so valuable that you can't put a price on it .
segments.speaker: S2
